byline.contributor: Nida Najar contributed reporting from Karaikudi, India.

headline.main: India’s Police Investigating Rape Accusation by American Tourist

snippet: A woman says a group of men assaulted her in April at a five-star hotel where she was staying as part of a package tour....
lead_paragraph: A woman says a group of men assaulted her in April at a five-star hotel where she was staying as part of a package tour.
